mapper.select: select a.company_no , b.company_name , a.account_no , a.user_name , a.email , convert(varchar(max), a.password) password , a.user_type , a.nation_code , a.phone_number , a.use_status from member as a inner join company as b on a.company_no = b.company_no where a.company_no = #{companyNo};

select a.company_no , b.company_name , a.account_no , a.user_name , a.email , convert(varchar(max), a.password) password , a.user_type , a.nation_code , a.phone_number , a.use_status from member as a inner join company as b on a.company_no = b.company_no where a.company_no = #{companyNo} and a.account_no = #{accountNo};
